v.v: This is the word of Yahweh that came to Hosea son of Beeri in the days of Uzziah, Jotham, Ahaz and Hezekiah, kings of Judah, and in the days of Jeroboam son of Joash, king of Israel.
When Yahweh spoke at first through Hosea, he said to him,
So Hosea went and married Gomer daughter of Diblaim, and she conceived and bore him a son.
Yahweh said to Hosea,
It will happen on the day
Gomer conceived again and bore a daughter. Then Yahweh said to Hosea,
Yet I will have mercy on the house of Judah,
Now after Gomer had weaned Lo-Ruhamah, she conceived and bore another son.
Then Yahweh said,
Yet the number of the people of Israel
The people of Judah and the people of Israel
Say to your brothers, ‘My people!’
Bring a lawsuit against your mother, bring a lawsuit,
If not, I will strip her naked
I will not have any mercy on her children,
For their mother has been a prostitute,
Therefore I will build up a hedge to block her way with thorns.
She will pursue her lovers,
For she had not known that it was I who gave her
So I will take back her grain at harvest time,
Then I will strip her naked in the sight of her lovers,
I will also cause all her celebrations to cease—
“I will destroy her vines and her fig trees,
I will punish her for the feast days of the Baals,
So I am going to win her back. I will bring her into the wilderness
I will give her back her vineyards,
“It will be in that day—this is Yahweh’s declaration—
For I will remove the names of the Baals from her mouth;
“On that day I will make a covenant for them
I will promise to be your husband forever.
I will pledge myself to you in faithfulness,
On that day,
The earth will answer the grain, the new wine and the oil,
I will plant her for myself in the land,

v: “Go, take for yourself a wife who is a prostitute.
She will have children who are the result of her prostitution.
For the land is committing great prostitution
by forsaking Yahweh.”
“Call his name Jezreel.
For in a little while
I will punish the house of Jehu
for the bloodshed at Jezreel,
and I will put an end
to the kingdom of the house of Israel.
that I break the bow of Israel
in the Valley of Jezreel.”
“Call her name Lo-Ruhamah,
for I will no longer have mercy
on the house of Israel,
that I should forgive them at all.
and I will save them by myself, Yahweh their God.
I will not save them
by bow, sword, battle, horses, or horsemen.”
“Call his name Lo-Ammi,
for you are not my people,
and I am not your God.
will be like the sand of the seashore,
which cannot be measured or counted.
It will be that where it was said to them,
‘You are not my people,’
it will be said to them,
‘You are people of the living God.’
will be gathered together.
They will appoint one leader for themselves,
and they will go up from the land,
for great will be the day of Jezreel.
